amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the State grants portion of the Safe Drug and Preschool and Communities program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 36 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce appropriations for Education for the Disadvantaged by $46.5 million, and increase appropriations (by transfer) for the Safe Schools and Citizenship Education program.

action.text: Amendment (A025) offered by Ms. Johnson, E. B..

vote.text: On agreeing to the Johnson, E. B. amendment (A025) Agreed to by voice vote.
